info.title: KAOS
info.description: For additional general information on how to use this API please refer to the [additional documentation](./docs.html).

parameters.name: unitId
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of unit IDs to filter results to.

parameters.name: fieldsets
parameters.description: Specify which fieldsets to return.

allOf.description: The unit this channel belongs to

Location.description: The API endpoint to hit to get the created channel.

patch.description: Update parts of a channel's basic info

delete.description: Archive all data about a channel

get.description: Get posted messages for a channel

Location.description: The API endpoint to hit to get the created post.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: List of comma seperated user ids.

get.description: Get a list of all locations. The users and units returned in the results will be limited to the access you have.

parameters.name: fieldsets
parameters.description: Specify which fieldsets to return.

parameters.name: area
parameters.description: The area to limit results to.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country to limit results to.

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: The postal code to limit results to.

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: The province to limit results to.

get.description: Get a specific location. The users and units returned in the results will be limited to the access you have.

parameters.name: fieldsets
parameters.description: Specify which fieldsets to return.

get.description: Get a single network's venue type information.

200.description: A single network's venue type information.

Location.description: The API endpoint to hit to get the created venue.

get.description: Get the venue metadata for a single venue within a network.

patch.description: Update parts of a venue for one or more effective dates.

delete.description: Delete a single venue's information for all effective dates.

parameters.name: effectiveDate
parameters.description: The date and time to use as the effective date identifier. Defaults to the current date and time.  See the [effectiveDate docs](./docs.html) for more information.

parameters.name: fieldsets
parameters.description: Specify which fieldsets to return.

parameters.name: networks
parameters.description: The networks to limit returned units to.

parameters.name: freshnessScore
parameters.description: Filter on freshness score range.

parameters.name: qualityScore
parameters.description: Score based on how setup a unit is.

parameters.name: contentQualityScore
parameters.description: Score based on the quality of the content created by the unit (articles, posts, comments, etc).

parameters.name: activityScore
parameters.description: Score based on the frequency that a unit accesses the network.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of unit ids to limit results to.

parameters.name: unitType
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of unit types to limit results to.

post.description: Create a new unit of a specified type

units.description: Items that are sub units of this unit.

Location.description: The API endpoint to hit to get the created unit.

networks.description: Array of network ID's for the networks this unit is a part of.

get.description: Get a single unit and its details

put.description: Update a single unit's basic info

patch.description: Update parts of a single unit's basic info

delete.description: Delete all data about a unit and its sub units for all effective dates.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Comma separated list of user IDs to filter results to.

parameters.name: includeInherited
parameters.description: Whether to include inherited members.

put.description: Attach one or more members to a unit with the specified attributes. If a member is attached without attributes then they will have basic read access.

patch.description: Partial update some attributes for one or more members.

delete.description: Remove one or more members from the unit.

put.description: Attach a members to a unit with the specified attributes. If a member is attached without attributes then they will have basic read access.

authorizationAttributes.description: The authorization attributes that apply to this user for this unit within the unit's networks.

inherited.description: If the authorization attribute comes from a parent unit then `true`, if it comes from this unit then `false`.

unitId.description: The unit id where this attribute was assigned.

patch.description: Update some attributes for existing members or potentially add a member with set attributes.

items.description:
Authorization attributes may be one of the following values:
- **contributer** - Can make posts as well as edit and delete own posts.
- **channel manager** - Can create, edit, and delete channel. Can see all channels and their posts. Can modify channel membership for any channel.
- **event manager** - Coming soon
- **moderator** - Can make posts as well as edit or delete any posts.
- **user manager** - Can add or remove users and set authorization attributes to other users.

delete.description: Remove a members from the unit.

put.description: Set a unit as a sub unit to a parent unit. A unit cannot be a sub unit to two different parent units. Placing a unit as a sub unit of a parent when the sub unit already has a parent will unlink the previous parent and link to the new parent.

delete.description: Unlink a sub unit from a parent unit.

parameters.name: effectiveDateRange
parameters.description: The start date-time and end date-time to use for the effective date identifier. Specifying this parameter will overwrite the effectiveDate query parameter. See the [effectiveDate docs](./docs.html) for more information.

parameters.name: fieldsets
parameters.description: Specify which fieldsets to return.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Filter results to the specific user ids.

parameters.name: accessibility
parameters.description: Filter based on accessibility

parameters.name: freshnessScore
parameters.description: Filter on freshness score range.

parameters.name: qualityScore
parameters.description: Filter on quality score range.

parameters.name: contentQualityScore
parameters.description: Filter on content quality score range.

unit.description: The unit that granted this membership and attributes attribute.

displayName.description: The publicly displayed name for this user.

shortDescription.description: A short description that a user can add for themself.

longDescription.description: A longer description that a user can add for themself.

networks.description: The networks that the user currently has an account with.

vanityUrlPath.description: The URL to the user's own page within the networks.

website.description: A URL to the user's own external website.

allOf.description: How active the user is, how often the log in, how often they interact.
Quality of a user's identifying data. The more information the unit has filled out (phone, address, logo, about, etc) the higher the quality.
Quality of a units content. Are their posts relevant? Do they have images, how many likes, how many comments. Have posts been reported as bad or inappropriate content.

get.description: Get a single user and its details

put.description: Update a single user's basic data.

delete.description: Delete a user for all effective dates.

patch.summary: Partial update a user's personal info

uid.description: Unique identifier (UUID v1, date-time and MAC address)

allowComments.description: Set to `false` to disable future comments and hide current comments.

channels.description: The channels that the post was made to.

deleted.description: Whether this comment has been deleted.

post.description: The ID of the post that this comment is attached to.

user.description: The user who made the comment.

deleted.description: Whether this post has been deleted.

small.description: The URL to the small image.

medium.description: The URL to the medium image.

large.description: The URL to the large image.

uid.description: Unique identifier (UUID v1, date-time and MAC address)

allOf.description: The user who made the post.

effectiveDate.description: The date and time range for which this information is effective.

start.description: Defaults to the current date and time.

effectiveDateRange.description: All effective date ranges that exist for this item.

locality.description: The name of the city or town.

province.description: The name of the province or state.
